name: Door To Atlantis
description:
"After decades of reading, studying, sailing, searching and exploring I have finally found the location of an island rumoured to hold ruins from ancient Greek times. These ruins are said to be the remains of Atlantis or at least remnants of any surviving inhabitants. In some folklore it is even said to hold a doorway, a passage, to the city, still alive and well - preserved thanks to its advanced ancient technologies. Now that would be proof of the existence of the Greek gods, wouldn’t it…"

An escape room with a twist, you're not trying to get out, you're trying to get in...
